import React ,{useState,useEffect} from 'react' import {Link, useParams} from 'react-router-dom' import {Row, Col , Image ,ListGroup,Button ,Card, ListGroupItem } from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import axios from 'axios' function ProductScreen({match}) { // const prod_id=useParams().id; // const product= products.find((p)=>p._id==prod_id) // console.log(prod_id); const[prodcut,setProduct]=useState([]) useEffect(()=>{ async function fetchProducts(){ const {data}= await axios.get('http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/products/') setProducts(data) } fetchProducts() },[]) return (
Go Back

 Price: Rs.{product.price} Description: {product.description} Price: Rs.{product.price} Status: {product.countInStock>0?'In Stock':'Out of Stock'}
) } export default ProductScreen
